text: jab unhonne apana saamaan khola, to unhonne apane maal apanee or vaapas kiya hua paaya. ve bole, "ai mere baap, hamen aur kya chaahie! yah hamaara maal bhee to hamen lauta diya gaya hai. ab ham apane gharavaalon ke lie khaady-saamagree laenge aur apane bhaee kee raksha bhee karenge. aur ek oont ke bojhabhar aur adhik lenge. itana maap (galla) mil jaana to bilakul aasaan hai.
